<script setup lang="ts">
import { onMounted, ref } from 'vue';
import RecordFilter from './components/RecordFilter.vue';
import RecordTable from './components/RecordTable.vue';
import { delEmptyQueryNodes } from '@/utils/object';
import useStore from '@/store';

const { distributionStore } = useStore();

const recordFilterRef = ref(null);
const tableRef = ref(null);
onMounted(() => {
  recordFilterRef.value.search();
});

const tableData = ref(null);
const formData = ref(null);
/**
 * 查询历史记录
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const search = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  formData.value = filterForm;
  try {
    tableData.value = await distributionStore.getHistoryList(delEmptyQueryNodes({
      ...formData.value,
      page: tableRef.value.currentPage,
      pageSize: tableRef.value.pageSize,
    }));
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage.error(`查询失败，原因是${error.message}`);
  } finally {
    recordFilterRef.value.loading = false;
  }
};
/**
 * 重新查询历史记录(重置到第一页)
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const reSearch = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  tableRef.value.currentPage = 1;
  search(filterForm);
};
</script>

import { GlobalEventBus } from '@/globalEventBus';

import { quoteTableColumns } from './table-columns';
import { TagEnum } from './types/enum';
import { QuoteTableData } from './types/model';

const mainGridState = useMainGridStore();

const stkTable = ref<InstanceType<typeof StkTable>>();

const loading = useLoading(false);

const dataSource = shallowRef<QuoteTableData[]>([]);
initDataSource();

onMounted(() => {
  GlobalEventBus.addEventListener(GlobalEventBus.EventName.MainGridCurrentRowChange, initData);
});

onBeforeUnmount(() => {
  GlobalEventBus.removeEventListener(GlobalEventBus.EventName.MainGridCurrentRowChange, initData);
});

const { fetchData } = useRTD<QuoteTableData>({
  cfg: {
    removeLifecycleHooks: true,
  },
  pollingCfg: {
    interval: 5000,
    delay: Math.random() * 2000,
  },
  rtdCfg: {
    listenerId: 'handicapTableListener',
    point: 'bond_f5_broker_market_latest_quote',
  },
  // 过滤当前代码的数据
  dataFilter: data => data.thsCode === mainGridState.currentThsCode && window.validAuthSource.includes(data.tag),
  getDataFunc: getTableData,
  dataCallback(type, newData, tempPushData) {
    if (type === UpdatePolicy.Init) {
      updateDataSource(newData.concat(tempPushData), false);
    } else {
      // 增量
      updateDataSource(newData);
    }
  },
});

function initData() {
  initDataSource();
  fetchData();
}

/**
 * 分发操作前置校验
 */
const validateDistribution = () => {
  if (!tags.value?.length) {
    ElMessage({
      type: 'warning',
      message: '请先选择要分发到的具体场景',
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
    return false;
  }
  return true;

const loading = ref(false);
/**
 * 确认新增分发
 */
const submitAdd = async () => {
  if (!validateDistribution()) {
    return;
  }
  loading.value = true;
  try {
    await distributionStore.distributeContent({
      contentIds: distributionStore.contentSelectedList,
      contentScenes: tags.value,
      sceneType: OPERATE_TYPE.DISCUSS_FEED,
      action: ACTION.ADD,
    });
    closeDialog();
    distributionStore.refreshTable = true;
    ElMessage({
      type: 'success',
      message: '分发成功',
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
    distributionStore.refreshTable = false;
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage({
      type: 'error',
      message: `操作失败，原因是${error.message}`,
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
  } finally {
    loading.value = false;
  }
};

<script setup lang="ts">
import { onMounted, ref } from 'vue';
import RecordFilter from './components/RecordFilter.vue';
import RecordTable from './components/RecordTable.vue';
import { MESSAGE_OFFSET } from '@/store/constant';
import { delEmptyQueryNodes } from '@/utils/object';
import useStore from '@/store';

const { distributionStore } = useStore();

const recordFilterRef = ref(null);
const tableRef = ref(null);
onMounted(() => {
  recordFilterRef.value.search();
});

const tableData = ref(null);
const formData = ref(null);
/**
 * 查询历史记录
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const search = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  formData.value = filterForm;
  try {
    tableData.value = await distributionStore.getHistoryList(delEmptyQueryNodes({
      ...formData.value,
      page: tableRef.value.currentPage,
      pageSize: tableRef.value.pageSize,
    }));
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage({
      type: 'error',
      message: `查询失败，原因是${error.message}`,
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
  } finally {
    recordFilterRef.value.loading = false;
  }
};
/**
 * 重新查询历史记录(重置到第一页)
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const reSearch = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  tableRef.value.currentPage = 1;
  search(filterForm);
};
</script>

    tableData.value = await distributionStore.getHistoryList(delEmptyQueryNodes({
      ...formData.value,
      page: tableRef.value.currentPage,
      pageSize: tableRef.value.pageSize,

    ElMessage({
      type: 'error',
      message: `查询失败，原因是${error.message}`,
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
  } finally {
    recordFilterRef.value.loading = false;
  }
};
/**
 * 重新查询历史记录(重置到第一页)
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const reSearch = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  tableRef.value.currentPage = 1;
  search(filterForm);
};
</script>

<template>
  <el-card>
    <RecordFilter ref="recordFilterRef" @search="reSearch" />
    <RecordTable
      ref="tableRef"
      :tableData="tableData"
      @changePage="search(formData)"
      @changePageSize="search(formData)"

<script setup lang="ts">
import { onMounted, ref } from 'vue';
import RecordFilter from './components/RecordFilter.vue';
import RecordTable from './components/RecordTable.vue';
import { MESSAGE_OFFSET } from '@/store/constant';
import { delEmptyQueryNodes } from '@/utils/object';
import useStore from '@/store';

const { distributionStore } = useStore();

const recordFilterRef = ref(null);
const tableRef = ref(null);
onMounted(() => {
  recordFilterRef.value.search();
});

const tableData = ref(null);
const formData = ref(null);
/**
 * 查询历史记录
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const search = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  formData.value = filterForm;
  try {
    tableData.value = await distributionStore.getHistoryList(delEmptyQueryNodes({
      ...formData.value,
      page: tableRef.value.currentPage,
      pageSize: tableRef.value.pageSize,
    }));
  } catch (error) {
    ElMessage({
      type: 'error',
      message: `查询失败，原因是${error.message}`,
      offset: MESSAGE_OFFSET,
    });
  } finally {
    recordFilterRef.value.loading = false;
  }
};
/**
 * 重新查询历史记录(重置到第一页)
 * @param filterForm 表单数据
 */
const reSearch = async (filterForm: GetHistoryParams) => {
  tableRef.value.currentPage = 1;
  search(filterForm);
};
</script>
